loans.name: Hakika Group

texts.en: Sarafina, who is in her early 30s, is a divorcée with one son who still goes to school. She has been running a retail food shop for two years.

loans.use: to buy rice at wholesale prices to sell at her food shop.

loans.name: Phach's Group

texts.en:
A mother of seven children residing in Kampong Cham province, Phach is 47 years old and a farmer in the local area. She does cassava farming on a two hectares area to support her family as the main source of income, and she works for others for a fee for extra income. She has been with this business for ages and is able to earn about 16,000 KHR per day. 

This is the second micro-loan for Pheach’s group, consisting of two members, with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loan has supported her business and improved her family’s livelihood at a good pace. Now she and her co-borrower are seeking 1,200,000 KHR  each. As the leader, Phach will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and to plow her cassava farm. She hopes to grow her cash crop fruitfully and gain high yield with good profit to sustain her family, as well as to set aside some money to build a decent house for her family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and to plow her cassava farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Fatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 21 femmes fait partie du Banc Villageois qui a été crée le 13 décembre 2008. Il regroupe des femmes qui habitent le même village et des alentours. Elles font comme activité principale le commerce. Elles vivent une parfaite solidarité dans le Banc Villageois.
Khady debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est âgée de 38 ans. Elle est divorcée et mère 3 enfants dont 1 garçon. Elle a en charge aussi sa maman. Elle est vendeuse de poisson au marché de Dakar. En effet avec le prêt elle compte acheter 2 caisses de poissons par jours cela dépend ce que le marché lui offre. 
Les bénéfices générés lui permettent d'entretenir ses enfants et sa mère. Elle parvient à payer les frais de scolarité de ses 2 enfants qui vont à l'école.
texts.en:
This group of 21 women belongs to the banc villageois created on December 13, 2008. It is composed of women living in the same village and nearby. They mainly work as vendor. They show full solidarity as banc villageois members.

Khady, standing on the right in the photo and raising her hand, is 38 years old. She is divorced and has three children, one of whom is a boy. Her mother is also a dependent. Khady sells fish at the market of Dakar. Specifically, with this loan she plans to buy two cases of fish per day, depending on the market offer. The resulting revenues will allow her to provide for her children and her mother. She manages to pay for the schooling of two of her children. 
.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Sullay

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva in Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you Sullay, a worker at a sugar producing company in Magburaka. Through partnering with local companies, SMT is able to provide borrowers like Sullay with micro-loans that are repaid through payroll deduction.

Sullay is a 35-year-old man who is married and has 5 children. All his children are attending primary school. Sullay has been working as a plumber at the sugar company for 8 years. His wife works as a trader in the local market. 

Sullay has requested a loan of SLL 1,000,000 in order to purchase building materials such as zinc, iron rods, cement, etc. He will use these materials to work on the construction of his home in order to provide a better shelter for his family and protect them from the upcoming rainy season.

loans.use: to purchase building material such as zinc, iron rods, cement, etc.

loans.name: Mohamed J.s.

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva in Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you Mohamed, a 39-year-old resourceful husband and father working hard to provide for his family.

Mohamed has been working as a sugar technician at a local sugar producing company for the past 10 years.  He is requesting a loan of SLL 2,000,000 from SMT to purchase building materials such as cement, iron corrugated sheets, etc. He will use these materials to work on the construction of his home in order to provide a better shelter for his family and protect them from the upcoming rainy season.

Through partnering with local companies, SMT is able to provide borrowers like Mohamed with micro-loans that are repaid through payroll deduction.

loans.use: to purchase building materials such as cement, iron corrugated sheets, etc. to work on the construction of his home in order to provide a better shelter for his family and protect them from the upcoming rainy season.

loans.name: Nver

texts.en:
Nver is 36 years old and lives with his wife, son and daughter in Geghamavan village, which is in the Sevan area. Nver graduated from Sevan State Technical College, and he is a tractor mechanic by profession. He worked at his profession until 2006. After that he started to work for Sevan Fire Service as a fireman. He said he likes his job because he is able to help people at any time. 

At the same time, Nver and his family are engaged in agricultural businesses. His wife helps him to grow vegetables in their garden and sells them in the Sevan fruit markets. Nver has a large animal barn where he breeds cows, sheep, bulls and piglets. He likes his animals and takes care of them with great pleasure. As he confessed, animal breeding is more profitable than his job, which for Nver is just a charity occupation. 

This is the first loan with Kiva for Nver. He needs a loan amount of 700,000 Armenian drams to buy 3 young cows in order to enlarge his animal breeding business, and he hopes to receive a good profit. Nver believes that it will be good start and he hopes to cooperate with Kiva in the future again.

loans.use: To buy 3 young cows in order to enlarge his animal breeding business.

loans.name: Babati Group

texts.en:
Aisha, who is in her mid 30s, is married with two children, both of whom are grown-ups. She has been running a beauty salon for five years now. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Aisha's 5th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to repair her salon by putting in wall tiles, restocking the out-of-stock salon equipment; she has paid back all her loans successfully. She used the profits to start building her own house and cover household expenses. She will use this loan to buy more salon equipment and to start selling cosmetics in her salon. Her dream is to one day be able to finish building her house.

Aisha will share this loan with her loan group Babati. Its 8 members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more salon equipment and to start selling cosmetics in her  salon.

loans.name: Horn

texts.en: A 60-year-old married father, Horn is a local farmer residing in the Moung Russey district of Battambang Province. To deal with his family's daily living costs, he grows rice and sesame on two hectares. This is the business that he has been with for 10 years. Horn is a second-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s parter). He has fully repaid back his original loan with success; it enabled him to support himself better than before. Now, he is applying for a new loan of 3,000,000 KHR to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and seed, and to pay for labor on his farmland. He hopes to earn more yields and make a better profit profit than he did last year so that he can keep supporting his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and seed, and to pay for labor on his farmland.

loans.name: Irma Graciela

texts.es: Irma, tiene 28 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo, vive en el municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Ella tiene 3 años de tener su propio negocio de venta de ropa como blusas, pantalones, camisetas, y otros y sandalias. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en al comunidad y a sus alrededores. Ha decidido por un préstamo de 12,000 lempiras para comprar más mercadería como ropa variada y sandalias. Este préstamo le ayudara a mantener un inventario mas surtido y poder ofrecer variedad al cliente. Su objetivo es tener el negocio surtido para dejarlo como patrimonio a su hijo y en lo personal quiere ser una gran empresaria.
texts.en: Irma is 28. She is a single mother with one child and lives in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. She has had her own business for three years and sells clothing such as blouses, pants, shirts, and sandals. She sells door-to-door in the community and surrounding areas. She has decided to take out a loan of 12,000 lempiras for the purchase of more merchandise such as varied clothing and sandals. This loan will allow her to maintain a better stock and to offer variety to her customers. Her goal is to have a well-stocked business to leave to her child as an inheritance. In terms of personal goals, she wants to be a great businessperson.

loans.use: to buy clothing and sandals for sale.

loans.name: Jeaneth Concepción

texts.es: Doña Janett, casada el esposo albañil, sus hijos ya todos son mayores de edad e independientes, ella continua con su pequeño negocio el kiosco escolar siendo sus principales clientes los niños de un colegio. Doña Janett una señora que se preocupa por el bienestar de la familia y vivir de una manera digna, solicita este crédito para continuar con la construcción de su casa, en esta ocasión levantara una pared lo que le permitirá avanzar un poquito con la infraestructura dejando pendiente la mayor parte como paredes, piso, ventanas, por su condición económica no puede realizar este gasto de un solo, pero poco a poco irá garantizando la seguridad de su familia.
texts.en: Doña Janett is married to a bricklayer. Their children are all grown and independent. She is continuing with her small business, a kiosk for schoolchildren. Her main customers are the students from a school. Janett is a woman who is very concerned with her family's well-being and wants them to live a dignified life. She is requesting this loan to continue with her home's construction. She will raise a wall which will allow her to improve the infrastructure a bit. She still has to put in walls, flooring, and windows. Because of her economic situation she is not able to do this all at once, but bit by bit she is guaranteeing her family's security.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, blocks, and iron.

loans.name: Elizabeth's Group

texts.es:
La señora Elizabeth es viuda, tiene 33 años de edad, curso el 2do. año de educación primaria, tiene 5 hijos y de ellos nadie estudia, ella se dedica a la elaboracion de borado de guipiles, inició este negocio con la ayuda de su madre y hasta el momento lleva 4 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y decide realizar un préstamos que lo utilizará para la compra de hilos para bordar guipiles, en el futuro quiere contar con un local en el mercado para la venta de guipiles. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican tambien a bordar guipiles.
en la fotografia aparecen 11 señoras pero solo a 10 se les concedio el préstamo.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a widow and is 33 years old.  She has up to a 2nd grade education, and has 5 children.  None of her children attend school.  She works in embroidering regional dresses, and started this business with the help of her mother.  She has 4 years of experience with her business.

She organized a group and decided to request a loan that she will utilize to buy thread for embroidering dresses.  In the future she wants to have a location in the market to sell the dresses.  The other members of the group also work in embroidering dresses.  

There are 11 women in the photograph, but only 10 of them are part of the group requesting the loan.

loans.use: to buy threads to for embroidering regional dresses

loans.name: Papin

texts.en:
Papin and his family are still engaged in farming. With last loan from Kiva, Papin bought tomato seeds and raised a good harvest on his land. He received a good profit and repaired his barn for his animals. He breeds cows, bulls, sheep and chickens. He is very happy that the income from his farming allows them to meet their family's needs. 

Papin decided to enlarge the number of his animals and asks for a loan from Kiva lenders to buy 3 young cows and fodder for his animals. He hopes that it will be as good a deal with Kiva as his last loan.

loans.use: To buy 3 young cows and fodder for his animals.

loans.name: Esperanza Asegurada 3 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Carmela is one of our businesswomen. She works selling grocery products in her small store in her house. This kind of business is called "Colmado". She is a mother with 2 children. Only one of them lives together with her and her long term partner. They both work to support the needs of their household, and Carmela works every day to provide her children with a good education, clothing and food. She belongs to the "Esperanza Asegurada 3 & 4" Group together with 9 neighbors who also work hard to bring more stability to their families. 

Carmela is receiving her 10th loan from Esperanza Internacional and, because her loan repayments have been made punctually, she has been able to strengthen her business and make good investments. Her plan for this new loan is to invest in her business by buying different types of goods for daily meals, to increase her business inventory and to give better service to her clients. She uses the profits from the sales she makes to save. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy goods like rice, sugar, flour and beans.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 31-year-old married man, and he is a father to three sons and one daughter. Mohammad is employed and gets a small salary, which is not enough to cover all the family's needs. For the past three years, Mohammad has been driving a taxi, which has been a profitable project and a second source of income for the family.

Mohammad is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new engine for the taxi he drives. This will increase the taxi's ability to work extra hours and will enable Mohammad to take additional internal and external requests, which will improve the family's income positively.

In the photo, Mohammad is in front of his taxi.

loans.use: To buy a new engine for his taxi.

loans.name: Waza

texts.en: Waza is a 44-year-old married man who has 9 children. He lives in Ibb, Yemen. He is a hardworking entrepreneur, and a very innovative and creative person. His business consists of selling retail items: gifts, cosmetics and accessories for woman, His daily income isn't enough to cover his big family's needs. He wants to expand and buy new merchandise to meet the demands of various groups of customers, so he applied for a loan of 160,000 YER from AMB to buy cosmetics and accessories for woman to use. This loan will enable him to make additional profit and expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and accessories for for women.

loans.name: Kok's Group

texts.en:
Residing in Battambang Province where rice farming is the popular business in the area, Kok is 40 years old and a widow. She has five children, four of whom are still dependent on her as they are still in school. Like the rest of her neighborhood, she does rice farming. The four hectares of rice growing has returned her about 15,000 Riels (KHR) per day. Including this loan, she is a third-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva's partner). The past loans have enabled her to support her business on time and have helped her to increase her income and sustain better living conditions than before. 

Now, she leads a group of three to apply for a new loan. The total amount of her group loan is 2,000,000 KHR, of which 1,000,000 KHR is her portion. Kok will spend her loan portion to pay for plowing, to buy potash, rice seed, and to pay for transplanting. She hopes to earn more income, so she can expand her farming to a bigger scale.

loans.use: To pay for plowing, to buy potash, rice seed, and to pay for transplanting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a water purification filter.

loans.name: Phally's Group

texts.en: Phally is a 40-year-old mother of four dependent kids from Moung Russey district in Battambang Province, where the rest of her family is. For the sake of her family, she grows rice on three hectares and operates a motor-taxi service for supplemental income. The current business, in which she has been involved for 20 years, has returned her about 38,000 KHR per day. This is not the first loan for Phally with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past six cycles have returned her a positive impact, allowing her to upgrade her living conditions at a good pace. She also has completely repaid back her past loans with success. Now, she joins a group of two to apply for a new loan. Her requested loan amount is 1,400,000 KHR while the other member is applying for 1,000,000 KHR. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion on 12 sacks of fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes that this purchase will support her crop on time and boost her land's productivity, allowing her to triple her crop output.

loans.use: to buy 12 sacks of fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Roem's Group

texts.en: A resident of Battambang Province, Roem, 44, is married and has 10 children. Currently, only four children still count on her, as they are in school. She and the rest of her family depend solely on a single business, rice farming on one hectare. For 20 years, this business has returned her about 6,000 KHR per day. Roem, a third-time borrower, is joining with a first-time borrower in order to apply for a new loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid her past loan, which has increased the family's income and gradually helped relieve their burdens. Now, she is seeking a loan of 700,000 KHR while her co-borrower is asking for for 1,000,0000 KHR. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to plow her farmland and buy potash. She hopes to increase her income in order to expand her farmland.

loans.use: to plow her farmland and buy potash.

loans.name: Maria Alejandra

texts.es:
Su nombre  es Alejandra  tiene 19 años. Desde pequeña le ha gustado el campo de la salud y quería ser una gran doctora o enfermera. cuando termino de estudiar también tuvo a su hija así que para estudiar le toco esperar un año y  ya por razones económicas no estudiar medicina así que auxiliar de enfermería estaba bien para empezar al pasar el tiempo y después de que su hija cumplió seis meses empezó a trabajar porque necesitaba reunir  dinero para estudiar y entro a trabajar en un bar hay reunió todo el dinero que pudo  y después de un año de estar trabajando, busco por Internet instituciones para estudiar auxiliar de enfermería nunca había escuchado de el instituto y una amiga lejana que se entero que estaba buscando institutos para estudiar el auxiliar le recomendó mucho campo alto ya que ella se había graduado de allí del el mismo técnico así que se dirigió hasta allá para mirarlo y para preguntar lo que se necesitaba y le gusto bastante entonces fue cuando decidió y allí tenia que empezar a estudiar.

Entro a estudiar en pero antes de entrar a estudiar tenia que pensar en quien iba a cuidar de su hija, sus padres siempre le han colaborado en ser madre joven y con el estudio pero no podían tener a la niña así que la matriculo en un jardín pero con mucho esfuerzo por lo pequeña una vez la niña ubicada empezó a estudiar y ahora va en segundo semestre muy contenta porque sabe que los esfuerzos se gratifican de una u otra forma. Le ha gustado mucho estudiar en campo alto los profesores son excelentes y los compañeros muy agradables.
texts.en:
This is Alejandra, age 19. Even at a young age she liked the field of healthcare and wanted to be a great doctor or nurse. When she finished school, she gave birth to her daughter and had to wait a year to study. For economic reasons, she was not able to study medicine, so studying to be a licensed practical nurse seemed like a good start. Time passed, and after her daughter reached 6 months of age Alejandra started to work because she needed to earn money to study. She started working at a bar and saved all the money she could. After a year of working, she searched on the internet for schools where she could study to be a licensed practical nurse. She had never heard of Campo Alto, but an old friend who had completed the same degree there found out that she was looking for schools and highly recommended Campo Alto. So, Alejandra went there to look around and ask about what she would need, and she liked it a lot. That was when she decided to start studying there.
Before she started she had to think about who would care for her daughter. Being a young mother, her parents have always supported her with her studies, but they weren't able to take care of her daughter. Alejandra enrolled her in daycare, and this took a lot of work. Once her daughter was settled, Alejandra started to study. She is now in her second semester and is very happy because she knows that her hard work will be rewarded one way or another. She has very much enjoyed studying at Campo Alto. The professors are excellent and her fellow students are very friendly.

loans.use: to finish her studies.

loans.name: Alejandra Camila

texts.es:
Alejandra es una mujer de 21 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar para ayudar a sus padres, Alejandra no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración que desea, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Alejandra trabaja como vendedora en un centro fotográfico de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días atendiendo a clientes y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, ella cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Alejandra se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de una habitación en su vivienda, ya que esta solo tiene piso de tierra y requiere ponerle piso de concreto, de esta manera Alejandra y su familia tendrán mayor seguridad y bienestar, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de estudiar una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Alejandra is 21 years old. She is unmarried and lives in the city of Ica with her parents and siblings. She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic individual, with a great desire for self-improvement. Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources, and because she needs to work to help her parents, Alejandra has not been able to pursue a degree in Administration as she had wished. In her free time she likes to do some reading and she sometimes cooks a delicious Peruvian stewed pork dish [Carapulcra] to share with her family. 

On her own initiative and with much persistence and dedication, Alejandra works as a sales clerk in a photography shop in her city. She works every day, taking care of clients for approximately 10 hours. She thinks things are going well for her because of the good service and friendly treatment that she gives others. 

Alejandra is very thankful for Kiva lenders; with their assistance she will be able to renovate a room in her home. This room has only an earthen floor and she needs to put down a concrete one. This way Alejandra and her family will have greater security and well-being. She will continue working hard to achieve her dream of attending university.

loans.use: to renovate a room.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es: claudia de 35 años de edad vive con sus tres hijo en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en el lugar de su residencia, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Claudia is 35 years old and lives with her three children in the house she owns.  She has a store where she sells staple items such as beans, milk, eggs, bread, and other items.  She has had this business for many years and it has given her the sales experience that allows her to earn more profits.  Her business is located in her home and is very well known among her neighbors in the area.  She has many customers since she always has the store stocked.

She would like to grow her business and make a new investment but she needs the capital to do so.  She is requesting a loan that will allow her to purchase the necessary items for her store.  She is sure she will repay the loan and hopes that it will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, snacks, oil, sugar, soft drinks, and other items.

loans.name: Delma Delia

texts.es: doña delma de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos que estudian actualmente, ella se dedica a la venta de perfumes, lociones, cremas, shampoos, etc. desde hace 15 años, tiene mucha clientela pues sus productos son de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, Doña Delma solicita un credito para poder comprar mas mercaderia como: perfumes, lociones, cremas, etc. para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Delma is 42 years old. She lives in her own home with her two children, who are studying at present. She has been selling perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoos, etc. for the past 15 years. She has a high number of customers as her products are of a high quality and at affordable prices. 

Delma is requesting a loan to be able to buy more stock, such as perfumes, lotions, creams, etc., in order to increase her earnings and give her family greater economic stability.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy materials to make traditional woven fabrics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cheese, pork rinds, corn, and other items.

loans.name: Samir

texts.en:
Samir is single and 24 years old. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He works but earns a low salary. He has been improving his house, little by little. He is requesting a youth loan from AMB in order to make certain improvements to his home. He has wanted to make these renovations since he acquired the property, however, due to a lack of resources he has not been able to do so.

With the loan he will buy construction materials, such as sand, ceramic tile, cement, etc. One of his dreams is to see the improvements to his dwelling completed.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as sand, ceramic tile, cement, etc., so he can improve his home.

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en:
Pov, age 44 and a rural villager from Moung Russey, is married and has four children. She works hard to make a living via rice farming on six hectares, with the support of her husband. The current business, which she has been involved with for 15 years, has earned her about 21,000 KHR per day. 

This is the third microloan for Pov’s group of two. The past loans have helped her family improve its livelihood. Now, she and her joint member are seeking 1,200,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will spend her portion to buy rice seeds, to pay the reaping fee, and to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to make more income than before so she can expand her farmland.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds, to pay the reaping fee, and to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Pedro Otoniel

texts.es: Don pedro vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos y su esposa, el posee un molino desde hace varios años tiene mucha clientela principalmente las señoras que elaboran tortillas pues ahi llegan a moler el maiz para elaborarlas ya que el es una persona muy amable y responsable, Don Pedro solicita un credito para poder comparar cuchillas, discos y todas las herramientas necesarias para tener un buen molino y asi seguir con su trabajo para darles el sustento diario a su familia sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en:
Pedro lives in his own house with his three children and his wife. He has had a mill for several years. He has a large clientele, mainly made up of women who make tortillas. They come to his mill to grind corn to make tortillas, because he is a friendly and responsible person.

Pedro is applying for a loan to buy blades, discs, and all the tools he needs to have a good mill and continue with his work, in order to give his family their daily sustenance with no limitations.

loans.use: to buy discs and blades for his mill, etc.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Doña Hilda es una mujer de 43 años de edad, casada que de su matrimonio tiene 3 hijos los cuales 2 de ellos viven en casa y la mayor de 25 años ya es una mujer independiente. Juntos en familia se dedican a la agricultura en la siembra de café y granos básicos como ser: maíz y Frijol actividades que realizan desde hace mucho tiempo actividad que fue enseñada por sus padres desde muy pequeña. Ella tiene un grado de educación primaria completa; pero no pudo seguir estudiando ya que los ingresos que sus padres obtenían eran muy pocos. 

Doña Hilda está solicitando ayuda para compra de fertilizante, abono, bombas de fumigación para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café, mismo que si no se le da mantenimiento y cuidado a tiempo puede ser dañado por la roya enfermedad que afecta especial mente esta clase de cultivo.  

Ella sueña con cultivar una mejor variedad de productos en su tierra ya que ella piensa que es el patrimonio para sus dos hijos los cuales en compañía de su padre dan asistencia al café y que en ausencia de ellos tengan algo seguro por lo que deben de trabajar y seguir formando un patrimonio para sus hijos y las futuras generaciones.
texts.en:
Hilda is a 43 year old married woman who has three children, two of whom live at home. The oldest daughter is 25 years old and is now an independent woman. The family works together in agriculture planting coffee and basic grains including corn and beans. She learned these agricultural activities long ago from her parents while she was a child. She has a elementary school education but could not continue studying because the income that her parents made was very minimal. 

Hilda is requesting help to buy fertilizer, manure and spray pumps to care for her coffee crops. If she does not take good care of these crops they can be damaged by blights that particularly affect this type of crop. 

She dreams to harvest a greater variety of products on her land because she believes that this will be the legacy of her two children who, together with their father, help with with the coffee crops. With these products they can have security, as they should work and continue developing the legacy for their children and future generations.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, and spray pumps for her coffee plants.

loans.name: Dúo Orfa Group

texts.es:
DUO  ORFA
Este dúo lo forma doña María Dali, de 23 años de edad, es soltera y nos cuenta que tiene una tienda ubicada en su casa en el caserío patzanes desde hace 5 años y está solicitando este crédito porque necesita invertir en su negocio comprando (golosinas, artículos, como maíz, frijol, aceite, arroz, margarina, frutas y verduras) etc.  Por su sector es muy difícil encontrar una tienda y por la distancia les falta surtir un poco mas y complacer a la clientela y evitarles que vayan hasta el pueblo a comprar lo que le hace falta para su comida entonces ella quiere invertir más en la tienda como en la compra de golosinas, artículos, como maíz, frijol, aceite, arroz, margarina, frutas y verduras y a si tener productos necesarios, y con eso seguir apoyando a sus papas.
texts.en: Maria Dali is a member of Duo Orfa.  She is 23 years old, single, and has had a store located in her home in the town of Patzanes for 5 years.  She is requesting this loan because she needs to invest in her business and purchase candy, corn, beans, oil, rice, margarine, fruits, and vegetables.  In her area, it is very difficult to find a store and the distance makes it difficult to stock up and please the customers and avoid them going to the town to purchase what is lacking for their meals, so she wants to invest more in the store.  She will purchase candy, corn, beans, oil, rice, margarine, fruits, and vegetables in order to have the necessary products.  This will allow her to continue supporting her parents.

loans.use: to purchase candy, corn, beans, oil, rice, margarine, fruits, and vegetables.

loans.name: Chreb's Group

texts.en:
Chroeb, 37, is married and has three schoolchildren and a little one who is too young for school. She is a rice grower on five hectares for rainy-season rice and two hectares for dry-season rice. The current business has returned her about 22,200 KHR per day. 

This is not her first loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loan with success, and it has improved her living status. Now, in a group of four, she is the leader. She and two other group members are seeking 1,400,000 KHR each, while the remaining member is applying for 1,000,000 KHR. For Chroeb, as the group leader, she will spend her portion on rice seeds. She hopes to replant her rainy-season rice on time and receive a good yield with a high income.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds.

loans.name: Somean

texts.en: Somean, 40, is a citizen from the Kandal Stoeng district of Kandal province. To strive for a living, she tailors clothes as the main source of income. She has been involved in the current business for five years. This is not the first loan for Somean with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has completely repaid her past loan wisely to upgrade her living conditions, making them better than before. For this cycle, she is seeking 2,400,000 KHR in order to buy a plot of farmland. She hopes this purchase will help her to own a farm for growing rice to earn extra income. She hopes that she can gain a high yield from the business.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland

loans.name: Reina De Los Angeles

texts.es: Doña reina de 41 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus 6 hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la criaza de pollos desde hace varios años, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar. Doña Reina solicita un credito para poder comprar vitaminas, concentrado y mas pollos para poder seguir con su negocio y asi darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Reina, 41, lives with her husband and six children in her own house.  She has made a living raising chickens for several years.  With the profits from her sales she's able to pay her household expenses.

Reina's requesting a loan to be able to buy vitamins, feed, and more chickens to continue with her business and give her family greater economic stability.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, feed, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle to support community health work and run a taxi business

loans.name: Roeun's Group

texts.en:
Originally from Battambang Province’s Moung Russey district, Roeun is 50 years old and married. She is a farmer who grows rice as her main source of income. To better feed the family, her husband also works for others for a fee during his spare time. She is able to earn up to 29,700 KHR per day from the current business, which she has been involved in for 10 years. 

She has repaid back completely her previous loans with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). This has supported her business and her living better than before. Now, in a group of three, she is the leader. All the members, including her, are seeking the same loan amount, 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, Roeun will spend her portion on potash and insecticide for her farmland. She hopes to gain a higher yield to better her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy potash and insecticide for her farmland.

loans.name: Sokoeun's Group

texts.en:
Sokoeun, a mother of one schoolchild and one younger child, living in Battambang province, is a rice farmer. She has been with her current business for 10 years, earning about 27,900 KHR per day. 

Now, she and her co-borrower are in their third loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). After the successful loan, which she has repaid fully, she feels confident that she can support her living better than before. Now she is seeking 1,400,000 KHR; it is the same amount as her joint member. As the leader, she will spend her portion on fertilizer and rice seeds, and to pay for reaping. She hopes to gain a high yield with a good income to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seeds and to pay for reaping.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, and cosmetics.

loans.name: José Salvador

texts.es: José vive junto a su esposa y a su hijo, el se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijoles, negocio en el cual trabaja desde hace más de 10 años con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gatos de su hogar, Don Jose solicita un credito para poder comprar más semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y mejorar el terreno que mustra en la fotografia, de manera que pueda producir mayor cantidad de granos básicos, para que sus clientes estén satisfechos de tal manera aumentar sus ventas y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and son.  He works farming corn and beans, a business he has had for more than 10 years.  With the income he earns from his sales, he is able to meet his household expenses.  

Jose is requesting a loan to purchase more seeds, manure, and fertilizer and to improve the land that is shown in the photograph so that he can produce a larger quantity of basic grains.  This will satisfy his customers so that he can increase his sales and give his family a more stable financial situation.

loans.use: to purchase manure, seeds, and fertilizers, and to improve his land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle to support community health work and run a taxi business

loans.name: Oscar Eliodoro

texts.es: oscar es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijas, es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra maíz y frijol. oscar desea incrementar sus ventas y por solicita un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Oscar is a very responsible man in terms of his household duties, and he has always been characterized as offering the best to his family. He currently lives with his life partner and their two daughters. He is very hardworking and he has always carried out his work happily and enthusiastically. He works as a farmer, planting corn and beans. 

Oscar would like to increase his sales, which is why he has applied for a loan which will allow him to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, and pesticide, among other items. He hopes to count on this help because he does not have any other financial income. He will then continue bringing home the daily bread without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, pesticides, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Raúl Alfonso

texts.es: Don Raúl vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hija, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, elabora puertas, balcones, rejas entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y tiene mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar cada día su labor, ya se hizo de mucha clientela pues lo buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, por los precios accesibles; Don Raúl es un hombre muy trabajador, honesto y sobre todo humilde, quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita de capital para compra de material por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar, hierro, metal, herramienta etc. el tiene buenas referencias crediticias y está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Raúl lives with his life partner and their two daughters. He has a metal workshop where makes doors, balconies, and bars, among others. He has been in this business for several years, and he has plenty of experience which helps him to improve his work every day. He has grown to have a large clientele because he is sought out for the quality of his work and his accessible prices.

Raúl is a very hardworking, honest, and above all humble man. He wants to grow his business, but he needs capital to buy materials, so he has applied for a loan which will allow him to buy iron, metal, tools, etc. He has good credit references and he is sure that he will be able to pay off his debt and bring financial security to his home at the same time.

loans.use: to buy iron, metal, and tools.

loans.name: Beena's Group

texts.en:
Beena is a 41-year-old woman. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible and hardworking housewife. Her husband sells plastic bottles, which is a profitable business. Presently, the bottle-making machine has stopped working, because of which her husband is unable to continue work. They are facing a serious financial problem.

Therefore, Beena, as a member of two-person lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband to purchase a machine for making plastic bottles. She wants to put aside some savings for her children's education with the profits. She is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase a plastic bottle-making machine for her husband's business

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
Carmen Rosa nació en la ciudad de Ica pero vive en la ciudad de Salvación.  (La ciudad de Salvación está ubicada en el distrito del Manu en la provincia de Manu dentro del departamento de Madre de Dios, Perú). 
Carmen Rosa tiene 42 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante su familia ella es profesora y trabaja en un centro educativo en la ciudad de Salvación. Ya son varios años que se enseña y ve la muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Tesoritos del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para  gastos de hogar como por ejemplo agua, luz y alimentación de su hijo. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Carmen Rosa was born in the city of Ica but lives in the city of Salvación.  (Salvación is located in the district of Manu in the province of Manu, within the department of Madre de Dios, Perú). 
Carmen Rosa is 42 and in a common-law marriage with one child. She is a hard-working and enterprising mother who is getting her family ahead. She is a teacher and works in an education centre in the city of Salvación.  She has been teaching for several years and it is going very well thanks to the hard work she puts into her job. She belongs to the "Tesoritos del Manu" communal bank. She needs a loan for household costs such as water, electricity, and food for her child. She is grateful for the loan and values it. She promises to repay her monthly quotas.

loans.use: to cover household costs such as water, electricity, and food for her child.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela de 43 años,está casada con el padre de sus 3 hijas. Todos ellos viven en una casa propia el cual esta ubicado en un caserío agrícola.Adela es una mujer fuerte y trabajadora. Desde los 18 años se dedica a las labores agrícolas. Siembra papas de distintas variedades ya que los suelos fértiles de su zona le permiten obtener frutos de calidad.
“El sabor de la papa en mi zona es especial, por eso siempre vendo mis productos ”, menciona. Además, hace 5 años decidió salir fuera de su ciudad y llevar sus productos hacia las ciudades costeras. Ahí sus productos tienen buena aceptación .  A veces su cosecha no es suficiente para los compradores, por eso tiene que comprar varios sacos de éste tubérculo a otros agricultores.De esa manera trabaja en armonía con su pareja para el bienestar de su familia.Éste es su segundo crédito con KIVA, por eso agradece la oportunidad brindada para continuar con su labor agrícola.Adela, invertirá los S/.4000 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Adela, 43, is married to the father of her three daughters.  They all live in her own house, located in a farming hamlet.  Adela's a strong and hardworking woman who has done agricultural labor since she was 18.

She grows a variety of potatoes because the fertile soil in her area allows her to get quality crops.  "The taste of the potato in my area is special, which is why I always sell my products," she says.  In addition, five years ago she decided to leave her city to take her crops to the coastal cities, where they are well received.

Sometimes her harvest isn't big enough for the buyers.  This is why she has to buy several sacks of this tuber from other farmers.  This way she and her husband work in harmony on behalf of the family's welfare.

This is her second Kiva loan.  She's grateful for this opportunity to continue with her agricultural work.

Adela will invest the 4000 soles [PEN] in buying organic soil amendments to nourish her fields.

loans.use: to buy organic soil amendments

loans.name: Ousama

texts.en:
Ousama is a 45-year-old single man from Lebanon. He is living with his two siblings. In 2009, in order to supplement the family’s income, he decided to start his own work as a farmer. His job consists of renting lands and taking care of it. He always seeks to diversify the harvestings to be able to satisfy the clients' needs. 

Today, he is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to pay his pick-up truck's mechanical fees. He will be using the loan to facilitate his transportation from a land to another and move his agricultural tools and supplies. He states that this will allow him to carry on easily and properly, which will result in higher profits. In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans and expand his lands by cultivating a wider variety of fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to pay his pick-up truck's mechanical fees

loans.name: Maria Zoila

texts.es:
La clienta Maria vive en Guayaquil.  Ella comenzó su negocio de venta de legumbres y vegetales ya que  no tenía trabajo fijo, comenzado poco a poco a mejorar sus ingresos comenzó a comprar en el mercado temprano  para tener una pequeña tienda. Actualmente ya tiene una tienda. 

Su dificultad en el negocio son los ladrones ya que hay bastantes en el sector donde ella vive. Es soltera, todos sus hijos son mayores de edad.

Con el préstamo quiere comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite para así mejorar los productos de su tienda. Su sueño es tener un negocio propio y grande.
texts.en: She lives in Guayaquil.  She started her business selling vegetables and legumes because she had no steady job.  She started gradually to improve her income and bought early in the market in order to have her small store.  She now has a store.  Her difficulty in the business is thieves because there are quite a few in the sector where she lives.  She’s single and all her children are adults.  She wants to use the loan to buy rice, sugar and oil to improve the products she has in her store.  Her dream is to have a large business of her own.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and oil.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en:
Ms. Khalida is a 28-year-old lady and enjoys doing the work of hand embroidery. Her embroidery patterns are very popular in her territory. Due to increased demand for her embroidery designs, she is including other women in her business to work for her in completing the orders of her customers on time. 

Khalida has two daughters and two sons. She is motivated to provide her family with the basic necessities of life, including food, clothes and education.  

In order to meet the growing demand for embroidery, she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 from Kashf Foundation. In this way, she can manage to buy more frames, needles and thread in different colors, which will help in generating more income. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan.

loans.use: to buy more frames, needles and thread in different colors, which will help in generating more income.

loans.name: Abil

texts.es:
Abil es un hombre de 29 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su esposa y su pequeño, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Abil no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Economía que deseaba, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver películas y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Sudado de Pescado para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Abil trabaja como chofer de carga en una empresa de su ciudad, el traslada diversos tipos de carga a diferentes partes del país, Abil trabaja todos los días y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Abil se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de de un pequeño puesto de ventas en un centro comercial de su ciudad, de esta manera Abil con el apoyo de su esposa podrán iniciar un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, el cual sea más estable para él y ya no viajara tanto dejando a su familia, así pues Abil seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener una vivienda segura que brinde mayor bienestar para su familia.
texts.en:
Abil is a 29-year-old man. He lives in the city of Pisco with his wife and his child. He loves them and they are his main reason for living. He is a very kind person, hard-working and enthusiastic. He and his wife give their all to get their family ahead. Abil wanted to study economics, but unfortunately he was unable to because of a lack of economic resources and the need to start working at a very young age.
In his free time he enjoys watching movies. Sometimes he cooks a delicious fish stew for his family.
On his own initiative, with great hard work and dedication, Abil works as a delivery driver for a local business. He transports various kinds of cargo to different parts of the country. Abil works every day and thinks that it is going well for him because of his good performance and the kind way he treats others.
Abil is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support he will be able to buy a small stall in a shopping centre in the city. This way Abil, with his wife's support, will be able to start a small business selling clothing for women, men and children. This will be more stable for him and he won't have to travel so much without his family. Abil will keep working hard to achieve his greatest dream: having a safe home to provide his family with greater well-being.

loans.use: to buy a stall.

loans.name: Juan Cruz

texts.es: juan es muy amable y trabajador, vive junto a cuatro hijos y su esposa. El trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela en la que siembra maiz ,sus productos son de muy buena calidad y la parcela está ubicada en una zona de fácil acceso lo que es muy bueno para él porque le beneficia que sus clientes puedan llegar inmediatamente hasta el lugar. juan solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga y fertilizantes, semillas, abonos y para mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografia que es donde siembar. El ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mjor vida.
texts.en:
Juan is very friendly and hardworking.  He lives with his four children and his wife.

He works very hard on his own plot of land, where he grows corn.  His crops are very high quality and the land is located in an easily accessible area.  This is beneficial to him because his customers are able to arrive there immediately.

Juan's requesting a loan from Integral to have the money he needs to buy agricultural inputs such as pest control, fertilizer, seed, and soil amendments, and to improve his land, which is shown in the photograph.

He wants to increase his sales so he can earn better profits and give his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy soil amendments, fertilizer, seed, etc.

loans.name: Los Intachables Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento LOS INTACHABLES está compuesta por ocho integrantes todas mujeres, que se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Francisca, tiene 40 años, casada con tres hijos de las edades de 13, 16 y 19 años, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas de temporada, desde hace ya bastante tiempo en esta  ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de frutas según la temporada, la Sra. Francisca es una cliente responsable ya que es un acliente antigua de la institucion, la Sra. Francisca enfrenta retos en su negocio que son salir de la pobreza y  va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida y la  de su familia su  sueño para su negocio es  crecer en su negocio para así generar más ingresos ya que este es la única  actividad que le permite mantenerse y mantener a su familia, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institucion por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
The Enterprising bank LOS INTACHABLES is comprised of eight members all women, who work in different activities. The president of the bank is Francisca, she is 40 years old, married with three children ages 13, 16 and 19. She sells seasonal fruit and has been doing this work for a long time. 

At this time she is requesting a loan to purchase seasonal fruits. Francisca is a responsible client who is an old client of Kiva partner EMPRENDER. Francisca faces challenges in her business which is getting out of poverty and she is going to use the profits to improve the quality of life for herself and her family. 

Her dream for her business is to grow it and thus generate more income since this is the only activity that allows her to support her and her family. She is happy and grateful for the support from EMPRENDER and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal fruit.

loans.name: Thach

texts.en: Living in the Kandal Stoeung district of Kandal province, Thach is 51 years old and married. She has five children, one of whom is still in school and under her dependence. To cover the daily cost of living for her big household, she grows rice while her husband works at a construction site for extra income. This is the first loan for Thach with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is seeking 2,500,000 KHR in order to buy 3 sacks of potash, rice seed, and water convolvulus seed to grow for extra income. She hopes that she can gain triple yield from her both cash crops and make a good profit.

loans.use: to buy 3 sacks of potash, rice seed, and water convolvulus seed

loans.name: Fiqiri

texts.en:
Fiqiri is a hard-working 55-year-old man who has been selling cherries and pears for the past ten years to wholesale buyers. He is married and the father of five children. For all these past years, he worked in Greece in the agricultural sector, while his wife was left behind to take care of the children, other family responsibilities, and the pear and cherry orchard they started ten years ago.
 
The business is doing well and Fiqiri is expecting an increase in production. 

For now though, he needs a loan of 150,000 Albanian Lek (ALL) to build a fence around the plantation to avoid any damage that animals might cause to the fruit trees.

loans.use: to build a fence around his cherry and pear orchard

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es: Fredy, de 29 años, es un hombre soltero que cuida de sus padres con quienes vuve en su casa propia.Fredy se dedica a la agricultura y a pesar de las dificultades que pueda tener con sus cultivos le gusta mucho el campo.  La siembra de papa, es su principal actividad. Todas las mañanas se dirige a sus terrenos agrícolas, donde cuida con esmero sus cultivos . sobre todo de las constantes enfermedades que sufren; producto del clima de la zona. Hace 8 años que se dedica a esta actividad, tiempo suficiente para conocer las temporadas de sembrío y así obtener mayores ventas en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad en la que reside . Para más adelante tiene pensado comprar sus propios terrenos agrícolas, con ello está seguro que podrá obtener más ingresos. A pesar de que  su principal inconveniente es contar con pocos recursos económicos y mucho más siendo el único que sustenta su familia , sin embargo trabajará con mucho ahínco para logar su objetivo. Fredy, invertirá los S/. 1000 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Fredy, 29, is a single man who cares for his parents; he lives with them in their own house.  Fredy works in agriculture and despite difficulties he might have with the crops he enjoys working in the fields.  His main activity is growing potatoes.  He heads out to his farm plots every morning to care for his crops diligently especially because of the constant illnesses they are susceptible to because of the local climate.

He’s been in this activity for 8 years which has been sufficient time to become knowledgeable about planting cycles thus obtaining the best possible sales in the wholesale market in the city where he lives.  He plans later on to buy his own farmland; he’s sure to earn higher income this way.

Despite his main inconvenience consisting in not having sufficient economic resources and he being the only source of support for his family, he nonetheless works quite diligently to attain his goal.  Fredy will use the 1,000 soles to buy organic manure to nourish his crops.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Marilin Jimena

texts.es: La Sra. Marilin  sigue con la actividad de la venta de cosméticos y joyas, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de electrodomésticos para su hogar,  cuenta que le fue bien  creció en su actividad e incremento su clientela, y por ende sus ingresos económicos, en esta ocasión solicito el crédito para la compra de cosméticos y joyas por mayor para seguir incrementando su capital de trabajo, se siente feliz y agradecida por esta nueva oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: Marilin, who still runs her business selling cosmetics and jewelry, says that all went well with her previous loan, which she used to buy electrical appliances for her home.  She says that it was a success because she was able to expand her business and increase her clientele and, as a result, boost her income.  She is now applying for a loan to buy cosmetics and jewelry in bulk so as to continue to increase her working capital.  She is happy and grateful for this new opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale cosmetics and jewelry

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is 41 years old (standing on the left in the photograph with his credit officer on the right); he has three children and only one attends school. He operates a cattle trade business as well as a butchery on the outskirts of Kagadi town and has been doing this business since 2006. He started this business as a source of income to look after himself and the family.

Hassan wants a loan of 3,000,000 shillings to complete payment on land. The cost for the land is 5,700,000 shillings of which he has only 2,700,000. He hopes to use this land for the grazing of his cows for sale because he has been hiring the grazing land and he hopes to save a lot from the business if this land is bought.

His major challenge is limited capital in the business as well as the transportation of animals to the market. His dream is to buy a vehicle to help him with the transportation.

loans.use: To complete purchase of  land to graze his cattle on.

loans.name: Eynass Group

texts.en:
Eynass Group consists of four ladies from Hodeida, Yemen. Each member has her own type of business. They have requested a group loan of 100,000 YER, and they will hold each other accountable for loan repayment.

Nadia is a 38-year-old mother of four children. She is an uneducated woman from a poor family. The income of her husband is not enough to cover living expenses, so she decided three years ago to help her husband and earn some money to provide better living conditions for her children. She has been selling sweets, vegetables, etc. She applied for a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB to keep her business running and expand it. She looks forward to making large profits.

loans.use: to keep her business running and expand it.

loans.name: Anila

texts.en:
Anila is a Roma Albanian who lives in the suburbs of a major city in southeastern Albania. 19, 10, and 2 are the ages of her three children. Unfortunately, neither one of the school-aged children goes to school, due to limited income, she says. 

“Both of us, my spouse and me, do our best to work and provide for our children. I sell any type of item at a lower cost, and my husband collects and sells scrap for cash. We do what we can…” Anila said. “The loan I am applying for now, 100,000 Albanian Lek (ALL), I will be using to buy new beach items to resell to make a little extra income. It will be my first loan, yet I promise that I will pay it back on time,” she added.

loans.use: to buy beach items to resell at a lower price

loans.name: Lirije

texts.en:
Lirije is a married Roma Albanian in her fifties. She has only one child, who is nineteen years old. The city where she and her family live is a major one in southeastern Albania.

 “Almost all members of our community enjoy buying/selling items, whether new or used, and I do too. I have been selling now for almost ten years and have made an okay income, not bad for this type of activity” Lirije said, smiling.

“I want to buy used items for the summer season at the moment and after that resell them; this is why I need this loan. I want to thank in advance whoever will be kind enough to lend to me. As little as 70,000 Albanian Lek (ALL) will help me to achieve my current plan,” Lirije added.

loans.use: To buy second-hand seasonal clothes and other items to resell.

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es: Doña maria vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijas, es comerciante de frutas y verduras desde hace varios años y eso le a dado la experiencia necesaria para poder tener su negocio vende de forma ambulante en las colonias que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia tiene mucha clientela pues vende a buen precio sus frutas y verduras, maria solicita un prestamo para poder comprar platanos, naranjas, papas, guineos, cebollas, tomates y todo lo que necesita para acrecentar su negocio y asi tener sus clientes satisfechos cuando le compren sus productos y ella prodra tener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a darle a sus hijos una mejor vida.
texts.en:
María lives in her own house with her husband and two daughters.  She’s been a fruit and vegetable merchant for several years and has gained the necessary experience to run her business from place to place in the neighborhoods near her place of residence.  She has a large clientele because she sells her fruit and vegetables at a good price.  

María is requesting a loan to be able to buy bananas, oranges, potatoes, plantain, onions, tomatoes and everything else she needs to increase her business and keep her customers satisfied when they buy her products so that she can earn higher profits that will help her give her children a better life.

loans.use: to buy onions, potatoes, tomatoes, cucumbers, etc.

loans.name: Moisés Arturo

texts.es:
Moisés tiene 35 años de edad, es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Él se dedica a la albañilería, estructuras metálicas (fabricación de puertas, portones, techos, etc.) y trabajos agrícolas. Todas estas actividades las aprendió de sus padres. Se levanta  a las 4:30 a.m. para prepararse e irse al terreno en donde tiene sus cultivos durante toda la mañana y por la tarde se dedica a la albañilería y a fabricar puertas, balcones, etc. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar un vehiculo para trasportar los materiales e insumos que necesita para desarrollar sus actividades productivas. Su objetivo, es construir su propia casa ya que en donde vive no es de él.
texts.en:
Moisés, 35, is married and has four children.  He works in construction, building metal structures (manufacture of doors, gates, roofs, etc.) and in agriculture.  He learned all these activities from his parents.  He rises at 4:30am to get ready and head out to his fields where he spends all morning on his crops; in the afternoon he works in construction and also manufacturing doors, balconies, etc.

The loan he’s requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy a vehicle to transport the materials and supplies he needs to carry out his productive activities.  His goal is to build a house of his own because the house he lives in now isn’t his.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle.

loans.name: Los Angeles De Florida Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LOS ANGELES DE  FLORIDA” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Margot es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de batidos, tienda de abarrotes, venta de carne, venta de ropa americana, venta de plásticos, venta de fruta.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Margot es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de verduras; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace tres años atrás observando a su cuñada que tiene el mismo negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de verduras) que adquirirá de las ferias de la Ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones en crédito y salud.
texts.en:
The “Los Ángeles de Florida” (Florida’s Angels) communal bank will start its second cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Senkata Focal Center.   It has 8 members led by a governing board presided over by Margot.  The communal bank members carry out a variety of business such as: blended beverage sales, grocery store, meat sales, American clothing sales, plastic ware sales and fruit sales.

The loan they’ll take out will benefit small micro businesswomen like Margot.  She states that she’s been part of Pro Mujer for a year having joined thanks to an invitation from a girlfriend who is a member of the institution.  She currently has a business selling vegetables.  She lets it be known that she learned this business three years ago watching her sister-in-law who has the same kind of business.

The loan she’ll take out now is to increase capital.  She will buy vegetables in one of the city of El Alto’s street markets to then resell them in her sales space.  This way of working makes it possible for her to generate resources to support her family the best way possible since she’s single and has a son.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the training sessions in credit and health.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Blidmer

texts.es: Blidmer, de 24 años de edad, es un hombre responsable. Vive en compañía de sus padres y sus dos hermanos, a los que cuida en su casa propia.Como hijo mayor, trabaja para ayudar a sus padres y hermanos, “mis padres son mayores, necesitan de mi apoyo”, afirma. Por eso hace algún tiempo, con la ayuda de su socio; alquiló un taller de fabricación de ladrillos, en los que realiza 30 mil millares al mes, vendiendo estos por pedidos establecidos con anticipación, ya que cuenta con clientes fijos a los que constantemente les ofrece buenos productos. Además de poseer gracias a su esfuerzo, 2 toros a los que alimenta con mucha dedicación en sus terrenos , cuenta que el mismo siembra alfalfa para alimentarlos. De esa manera soportan las largas jornadas de trabajo en el arado de la tierra. Ahora desea incursionar en la crianza de vacas, pues hay demanda en la compra de leche fresca, para ello dará el primer paso en la compra de una vaca de buena calidad.Este es su primer crédito con Kiva y se siente feliz, pues encontró la ayuda que tanto necesitaba, para emprender sus objetivos. Blidmer, invertirá los S/.500 soles en la compra de materiales para preparar sus ladrillos como: Arcilla, pegamento y otros productos.
texts.en:
Blidmer is 24 years old and a responsible man. He lives in the company of his parents and two siblings, whom he takes care of in their own house. As the oldest son, he works to help his parents and siblings, saying, "My parents are older and need my support." For this reason he has been working with the help of a partnership to rent rent a workshop for the creation of bricks. He makes 30 million bricks per month and sells them when he gets orders in advance. He now has repeat customers to whom he constantly offers good products. 

Furthermore, thanks to his effort, he has two bulls whom he cares for with dedication on his land. He also grows alfalfa to feed them. In this way he handles his long days of plowing the land. Now he wants to begin caring for cows because there is a demand for fresh milk, so he will take the first step by purchasing a good quality cow. This is his firm loan with Kiva and he feels happy to have encountered the help which he greatly needed to take on his objectives. Blidmer will invest the 500 soles in the purchase of materials to make bricks like clay, glue, and more.

loans.use: To buy materials to make bricks like clay, glue, and more.

loans.name: Dúo Donnis Group

texts.es:
Dúo DONNIS.
La señora Lucia de 53 años quien es la líder  de este dúo, siendo una mujer comerciante desde ya más de 12  años,  doña Lucia quien en su domicilio  cuenta con una venta de tortillas en las que atiende a muchas personas que la visitan  en los dos tiempos (almuerzo y cena) gracias a la atención y el  buen servicio doña Lucia logra realizar varias entregas a comedores de la localidad grandes  pedidos de tortillas, esto la ha llevado a contar con la ayuda de 3 señoritas quienes le ayudan a elaborar las tortillas y atender el negocio,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de maiz para la elaboracion de tortillas para la venta.
texts.en: In Dúo Donnia group, Lucia is 53 years old and is the leader of this group, being an entrepreneurial woman for more than twelve years. Lucia sells tortillas out of her home to people who visit during lunch or dinner. Thanks to her care and good service Lucia has managed to perform various deliveries to big eateries who request large quantities of tortillas. This has brought her the help of three women who help make tortillas and care of the business. She is asking for this loan to buy corn to make tortillas to sell.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase cabbages, tomatoes, okra, oil, etc. to resell

loans.name: Dalila

texts.es:
Dalila tiene 58 años de edad, es una mujer casada vive a lado de su esposo en su casa propia .Dalila tiene una tienda de comestibles y lleva 20 años dedicándose a esta actividad, se inicio vendiendo gaseosas y unas cuantas golosinas, pero con el pasar del tiempo fue ganando experiencia y mejorando su negocio, siempre acompañada de su esposo quien tomo le dio la iniciativa de poner un negocio buscando obtener otros ingresos .
Al principio como todo negocio, no le fue muy bien con sus ventas pero salio adelante y con las ganancias que obtiene de la venta diaria pudo abrir otro local pegado a la bodega donde vende cerveza.Este es su primer crédito con Kiva, por lo que esta muy agradecida por el financiamiento económico recibido,además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Con el monto solicitado de S/.1500.00 comprará productos para su negocio tales como azúcar, conservas de pescado , verduras , entre otros .
texts.en:
Dalila is 58 years old. She is married and lives with her husband in her own home. Dalila has a grocery store which she has run for 20 years. She started selling carbonated drinks, and some snacks, but over time she has gained more experience and improved her business. Her husband has been at her side all the time. He gave her the initiative to set up a business as a way to have another source of income.

At the start, as with any business, sales did not go very well. But things improved and with the income that she makes from her daily sales she has been able to open another business right next to the premises where they sell beer.

This is her first loan with Kiva. She is very grateful for this funding and is committed to making her repayments on time.

She will use the money, S/.1500.00, to buy products for her business, such as sugar, tinned fish and vegetables, etc.

loans.use: to buy products, such as sugar and tinned fish, etc.

loans.name: José Sebastian

texts.es:
José tiene 52 años de edad, vive junto a su mamá una señora de 84 años de edad. Él se dedica desde hace 14 años a la crianza de ganado y a realizar trabajos agrícolas; esta actividad la aprendió de sus padres. El ganando lo negocia en la plaza que esta a unos veinte kilómetros de su casa, para estar temprano sale a las 4:00 a.m. de su vivienda. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar dos bueyes para el trabajo agrícola (arar la tierra) y el resto lo utilizara para comprar fertilizantes. De esta manera, podrá cultivar a tiempo y prestara sus servicios con los bueyes y su carreta a otros agricultores. Por lo que espera tener otra fuente de ingresos para él y su mamá. Su deseo es que sus ingresos poder mejorar su casa para que su madre viva más cómoda y segura.
texts.en:
José is 52 years old and lives together with his mother who is 84 years old. He has dedicated himself to caring for cattle and performing agricultural work for the last 14 years, which he learned from his parents. He uses the cattle in the plaza which is 20 kilometers from his house. To be early hie leaves at 4:00 from his house.

He is asking Fundación Campo for this loan to buy two oxen for agricultural work (plowing the land) and using the rest to buy fertilizer. In this way, he will be able to cultivate over time and offer his services with the oxen and his cart for other agricultural workers. Because of all of this, he hopes to be able to have another source of income for himself and his mother. His wish is that his earnings will be able to improve his home so his mother can live more comfortable and securely.

loans.use: to buy two oxen for agricultural work (plowing the land) and to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
Edith de 26 años está casada con Joel de 30. Ellos tienen 2 hijos de 4 y 1 año de edad respectivamente. Esta familia habita en una vivienda alquilada la cual se ubica en un caserío rural.Edith es una mujer esmerada. Desde los 19 años trabaja en múltiples actividades como: la agricultura, la ganadería y el negocio.
Pero la que más satisfacciones le genera es la venta de productos comestibles. Para ello habilitó un puesto de ventas en su hogar. Expende carnes, verduras, frutas, abarrotes, conservas, bebidas, etc. “En todos estos años mi tienda ha crecido, por eso me siento contenta porque todo lo que ahora tengo, lo conseguí a base de esfuerzo”, dice.Dos veces a la semana viaja hasta otra ciudad para adquirir la mercadería necesaria.Edith considera que el trabajo es constante en su tienda, por ello requiere de su ayuda para obtener un préstamo y continuar con sus metas.Éste es su segundo crédito con KIVA y está agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para continuar creciendo como persona .
Edith, invertirá los 1600 soles en la compra de productos de primera necesidad tales como arroz, azúcar ,leche y otros productos al por mayor.
texts.en:
Edith is 26 and married to Joel, 30. They have two children, ages 4 and 1. The family lives in a rented house in a rural area. Edith is thorough and has worked at farming, livestock raising, and commerce over the past 19 years. She most enjoys selling food items and set up a small store in her house, where she offers meats, vegetables, fruits, groceries, jams, beverages, and more.

She says, “My shop has grown steadily over the years, and I am happy with all that I have because I have worked hard to get it.” She goes to another city twice a week to buy merchandise. Business is steady, and Edith needs a loan to reach her goals. This is her second loan cycle with Kiva, and she is grateful for the funding she has received to continue her personal growth. She will use the 1600 soles to buy wholesale merchandise such as rice, sugar, and milk.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, and milk.

loans.name: Judith Flore

texts.fr: judith est une femme de 36 ans, célibataire et père d'un enfant. il a ouvert un mini kiosque dans un quartier de la ville qu'elle gère depuis 4 ans. il y vend des crédits de communication. il sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des crédits de communication (MTN, Orange et CAmtel) afin d'augmenter son chiffre d'affaires. Ce qui permettra de réaliser un bénéfice non seulement pour augmenter son capital et activité et de satisfaire la clientèle. il voudrait, avec ces bénéfices, pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Judith is a 36-year-old woman, unmarried, and the mother of one child. In a district in the city, she opened a mini-kiosk, which she has been managing for four years. She sells communication credits there. She is requesting this loan to purchase communication credits (MTN, Orange, and CAmtel) to increase her sales. This will enable her to make a profit not only to increase her capital and her business but to satisfy her customers. She would like to use her profits to meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase communication credits

loans.name: Beogoneere Group

texts.fr:
